00041 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00042 
00043 $View->UploadLogFile();
00044 
00045 $LogFile= GetLogFile();
00046 
00047 $DateArray= array('Month' => '', 'Day' => '');
00048 
00049 $GraphStyle= 'Daily';
00050 $GraphType= 'Horizontal';
00051 
00052 if ($_POST) {
00053     $GraphStyle= $_POST['GraphStyle'];
00054 
00055     if ($_POST['GraphType']) {
00056         $GraphType= $_POST['GraphType'];
00057     }
00058     else {
00059         if ($_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType']) {
00060             $GraphType= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType'];
00061         }
00062     }
00063 }
00064 else if ($_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle']) {
00066     $GraphStyle= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle'];
00067     $GraphType= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType'];
00068 }
00069 
00070 if ($GraphStyle == 'Daily') {
00071     $GraphType= 'Vertical';
00072 }
00073 
00074 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle']= $GraphStyle;
00075 if ($GraphStyle == 'Hourly') {
00076     $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType']= $GraphType;
00077 }
00078 
00079 $StatsConf= $Modules[$View->Model]['Stats'];
00080 
00081 $View->Controller($Output, 'GetAllStats', $LogFile, $GraphStyle == 'Hourly' ? 'COLLECT' : '');
00082 $AllStats= unserialize($Output[0]);
00083 $Stats= unserialize($AllStats['stats']);
00084 $BriefStats= unserialize($AllStats['briefstats']);
00085 $DateStats= $Stats['Date'];
00086 
00087 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00088 
00089 PrintLogFileChooser($LogFile);
00090 ?>
00091 <table>
00092     <tr>
00093         <td class="top">
00094             <?php
00095             $View->PrintStats($LogFile);
00096 
00097             if (isset($StatsConf['Total']['BriefStats'])) {
00098                 foreach ($StatsConf['Total']['BriefStats'] as $Field => $Name) {
00099                     PrintNVPs($BriefStats[$Field], _($Name), 50);
00100                 }
00101             }
00102             ?>
00103         </td>
00104         <td class="top">
00105             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00106                 <select name="GraphStyle">
00107                     <option <?php echo ($GraphStyle == 'Hourly') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Hourly' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Hourly') ?></option>
00108                     <option <?php echo ($GraphStyle == 'Daily') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Daily' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Daily') ?></option>
00109                 </select>
00110                 <?php
00111                 if ($GraphStyle == 'Hourly') {
00112                 ?>
00113                 <select name="GraphType">
00114                     <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Vertical') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Vertical' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Vertical') ?></option>
00115                     <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Horizontal') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Horizontal' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Horizontal') ?></option>
00116                 </select>
00117                 <?php
00118                 }
00119                 ?>
00120                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00121             </form>
00122             <?php
00123             foreach ($StatsConf as $Name => $Conf) {
00124                 if (isset($Conf['Color'])) {
00125                     PrintGraphNVPSet($DateStats, $DateArray, $Name, $Conf, $GraphType, $GraphStyle);
00126                 }
00127             }
00128 
00129             if (isset($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'])) {
00130                 foreach ($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'] as $Name => $Conf) {
00131                     PrintGraphNVPSet($DateStats, $DateArray, $Name, $Conf, $GraphType, $GraphStyle);
00132                 }
00133             }
00134             ?>
00135         </td>
00136     </tr>
00137 </table>
00138 <?php
00139 PrintHelpWindow(_($StatsWarningMsg), 'auto', 'WARN');
